attributes.action: Send Delia Smith back to the Moon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the underside, have had our attention brought to us by THE BLOB, that growing levels of obesity are in fact an Alien plan to fatten us all. They have, it is allegded, been abducting and casting back the 'tiddlers' for generations.
It is also highly likely that Delia Smith is part of this pan galaxy plan of the Aliens and that she is, allegdedly, here on earth to encourage us all to eat more rubbish.
We therefore petition Government to make urgent arrangements for said 'Delia Smith' to be sent back to the moon quick sharp.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
